channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Donald Trump stands his ground as Judge Merchan hands down no-jail sentence for felony conviction

item.title: Trump faces influence test at Mar-a-Lago with warring House GOP factions: 'How do we move forward?'
item.description: House Republicans who President-elect Donald Trump summoned to Mar-a-Lago this weekend are hoping to reconcile their own agenda with his.

item.title: Trump set to face criminal reckoning, but no jail time, on N.Y. convictions
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump will be sentenced Friday by a New York judge for the felony convictions handed down by a Manhattan jury last spring.

item.title: Trump the Expansionist Knows Real Estate Matters
item.description: Geography isn’t everything, but often when it comes to geopolitics, there’s no substitute for cold, hard acreage.

item.title: Crime, Corruption, And Incompetence Pay Well For Leftist Big City Leaders
item.description: The nation’s largest cities, run by Democrats, are crime-infested, debt-ridden places making their liberal leaders a very good living.
